page.title: 06The Game Of Marbles
page.content: Marbles is a game which has been a custom for over 200 years.It involves two or more people.There are two ways of playing marbles,"keeps" or "friends"."Keeps" is when you play to win and keep the marble."Friends" is when the owner keeps his marble whether he wins or loses. Marbles are round and are all different.Some are spotty,striped,or made of china.They are all different sizes.Altogether there are many different names such as King Kongs, Chinas,Bonks,Rainbows,Cats-eyes,Black Magics ,Spotted Dicks and Grandfathers. Marbles are one of the most popular games in Weston Turville School at the present time.
